title: El Morro National Monument: Operating Hours & Seasons
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Operating Hours & Seasons              Operating Hours & Seasons       2016 Summer Hours: (Continue through Monday, September 5, 2016) Visitor Center-9:00 am to 6:00 pm; Trails-9:00 am to 5:00 pm Please plan to be here by 5:00 pm at the latest to walk the 1/2-mile Inscription Trail; 4:00 pm to walk the entire 2-mile Headland Trail.   2016-2017 Winter Hours: (Winter hours begin Tuesday, September 6, 2016 and will remain in effect until May 29, 2017 ) Visitor Center-9:00 am to 5:00 pm; Trails-9:00 am to 4:00 pm. Please plan to be here by 4:00 p.m. at the latest to walk the 1/2-mile Inscription Trail; 3:00 pm to walk the entire 2-mile Headland Trail.  Dates and times are subject to change based upon staffing. Please call the visitor center (505-783-4226 ext. 801) for the most up-to-date information.  Closed Thanksgiving (November 24), Christmas (December 25), and New Year's (January 1).   Portions of the park trails, including all of the Headland Trail, may be closed during the winter months (December through mid-May) because of ice and snow. For current trail conditions, call 505 / 783-4226 x801. Visit the Weather page for more information.    Â     Winter can be a beautiful time to visit. NPS photo by Sarah Beckwith
